EmailTemplate.description: IF Field Event created 30 days ago, still shows FSR Temp account, notify creator and manager to update.
EmailTemplate.name: Notify for field events still with FSR Temp account,
EmailTemplate.subject: Field Event # {!Field_Event__c.Name} Still Shows Temporary Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
USER ACTION ITEM STILL PENDING
The following Field Event record is still showing as being tied to a temporary Account.
Report Number: [Field Event - ASA.Report Number] Report Type: [Field Event - ASA.Report Type] ([Field Event - ASA.Field Event Type]) Account Name: [Field Event - ASA.Account Name] Created: [Created] Created By: [Field Event - ASA.Created By Name]
Please update this Field Event to reflect a proper Account. This notification has been sent to the creator of this Field Event, and that person's manager.
Thank you.
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time.
Honeywell - Confidential
